name: TRANSITEAM
description: Funds Raising & M&A Advisor for TMTs
tag_list: fund, ma, merger, acquisition, tmt, techno, mobile, telco, social, crm, marketing, investment, funding, raising, startup, europe, france, germany, brazil, spain
overview:
TRANSITEAM is delivering funds raising and mergers-acquisitions advisory services dedicated to TMTs (Technologies-Media-Telcos, including Mobile, Cloud Platforms, Consulting, CRM, Digital Marketing Services and Social Media).

We are focused in serving small to midcap markets for growth companies, mainly in Europe, Brazil, India, Ukraine and USA with Global reach ambition.
